and CONCAT(a.name,a.address,a.contact,a.mobile) like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

NAME AS "status", b.id AS "orgId" FROM mg_org_auth a, sys_org b, sys_time_list c LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON c.update_user = d.id, v_status e WHERE a.org_id = b.id AND a.id = c.bill_id AND e.val = a.`status`
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a. NAME AS "name", a.auth_url AS "authUrl", a.auth_icon AS "authIcon" FROM sys_auth a WHERE a.mg_type='1' ORDER BY a.seq

and CONCAT(a.name,a.flag) like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
